name: Gallery Clean Up
description:
The Art Gallery has been closed so long, cobwebs have  formed!

Use the Feather Duster to clean it all away before the opening tomorrow!

Instructions:

To Move: Left and Right Arrow

To Launch Feather Duster: Spacebar

* Music from https://www.bensound.com

Sound Effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Art work by Grace Rabbitte

Made with Unity
